items.title: Guidance: Subsidy Control Act 2022: Streamlined Routes
items.summary: Streamlined Routes (also known as Streamlined Subsidy Schemes) are a type of subsidy scheme made by the UK government for use by any UK public authority.

items.title: Notice: Heat Pump Ready Programme
items.summary: The programme supports the development and demonstration of heat pump technologies and tools, and solutions for optimised deployment of heat pumps.

items.title: Extending the ECO4 end date
items.summary: We’re seeking views on extending the end date of the Energy Company Obligation (ECO4) scheme to maintain support for households and the supply chain.

items.title: UK marks first anniversary of 100 Year Partnership in Kyiv with new backing for reform and reconstruction
items.summary: The UK is stepping up its support for Ukraine as both countries mark the first anniversary of the landmark 100 Year Partnership.

items.title: UK and US nuclear experts sign landmark partnership
items.summary: Nuclear Transport Solutions sign new strategic agreement on development of transport package designed to safely move the next generation of nuclear fuel.

items.title: Policy paper: UK Critical Minerals Strategy
items.summary: The government's new strategy sets the UK’s long-term ambition to ensure we have the critical minerals we need to drive economic growth and the clean energy transition.

items.title: Transparency data: UK-Vietnam FTA Joint Forum on Trade and Sustainable Development – meeting minutes, 27 June 2025
items.summary: Minutes of the second Joint Forum on Trade and Sustainable Development under the Free Trade Agreement between Vietnam and the United Kingdom (UKVFTA).

items.title: Decision: UK-Japan CEPA documents
items.summary: Decisions, documents and meeting minutes from the UK-Japan Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA).

items.title: Starter guide to UK sanctions
items.summary: A guide for businesses and organisations that need to understand more about what sanctions are and how they work.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: countervailing duty on rainbow trout from Turkey
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the countervailing duty on rainbow trout from Turkey.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence (export after exhibition: dual-use items)
items.summary: Licence allowing the export of dual-use items if they have been temporarily imported into the UK for exhibition or demonstration.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on ammonium nitrate from Russia
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on ammonium nitrate from Russia.

items.title: Official Statistics: UK trade in numbers
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s latest trade and investment position, summarising statistics produced by ONS, DBT, and UNCTAD.

items.title: Official Statistics: Great British Insulation Scheme release: January 2026
items.summary: Statistical release on Great British Insulation Scheme (GBIS) statistics to monitor the installation of energy efficiency measures in domestic properties in Great Britain.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Household Energy Efficiency Statistics, headline release January 2026
items.summary: Household Energy Efficiency Statistics, headline release (January 2026).

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment core statistics book
items.summary: A monthly snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment position, summarising trade statistics produced by ONS, HMRC, DBT and others.

items.title: Independent report: Alternative models of commercial finance on the UK economy: research on economic impacts
items.summary: Econometric research by NIESR on the effect of alternative systems of commercial finance on lending to businesses, investment, and gross domestic product (GDP).

items.title: Impact assessment: Steel Industry (Special Measures) Bill, 2025: final impact assessment
items.summary: Impact assessment for the Steel Industry (Special Measures) Bill, outlining the case for legislation, expected impacts and monitoring of the special measures.

items.title: Research: Evaluation of the Boiler Upgrade Scheme, 2025
items.summary: The second set of interim findings from the evaluation of the Boiler Upgrade Scheme and accompanying survey data tables.

items.title: Notice: Convention on Supplementary Compensation for Nuclear Damage (CSC): entry into force
items.summary: This is a notice that the Convention on Supplementary Compensation for Nuclear Damage (CSC) entered into force in respect of the UK on 1 January 2026.

items.title: Promotional material: Employment Rights Act 2025: factsheets
items.summary: Further details on the measures included within the Employment Rights Act 2025.

items.title: Notice: Notices made under s32A of the Taxation (Cross-border Trade) Act 2018
items.summary: Notices made which have the force of law under s32A of the Taxation (Cross-border Trade) Act 2018.

items.title: Guidance: Capture Redress Scheme: independent panel chair framework
items.summary: This framework sets out how the chair will oversee the governance and consistency of the Capture Redress Scheme independent panel.
